simplecv.utils.analyze module¶

simplecv.utils.analyze.display_dataset(results, score_thr, output_dir, simple=False)[source]¶

Show model prediction results, none gt.

Args:
results (list): List of (file_name, none, none, dt, none).

Via simplecv.mmdet_v1.test_net.test_dir().

score_thr (dict): Such as dict(CODE1=S1,CODE2=S2,…). output_dir (str): Directory where the draft are saved. simple (bool): Whether to simplify the draft image.

Returns:

None.

simplecv.utils.search_thr module¶

simplecv.utils.search_thr.find_score_thr(results, min_p=0.8, min_r=0.85)[source]¶

Find score threshold, at the best F-score.

Args:
results (list): List of (file_name, target, predict, dt, gt).

Via simplecv.mmdet_v1.ext_utils.translate.trans_test_results().

min_p (float): Accepted minimum call precision. min_r (float): Accepted minimum recall rate.

Returns:

score_thr (dict): Such as dict(CODE1=S1,CODE2=S2,…).

simplecv.utils.translate module¶

simplecv.utils.translate.get_val(data, key, val=None)[source]¶
simplecv.utils.translate.guess_code_by_complex(dt, code_grade, score_thr)[source]¶

Above the threshold are sorted by priority, the same priority are selected with higher scores.

Args:

dt (list): List of dict, keys label and score is required. code_grade (dict): Such as dict(CODE1=LVL1,CODE2=LVL2,…). score_thr (dict): Such as dict(CODE1=S1,CODE2=S2,…).

Returns:

A dict, the best code.

simplecv.utils.translate.trans_test_results(results, guess_target=None, guess_predict=None)[source]¶

Update target and predict, use important defect as image code.

Args:
results (list): List of (file_name, none, none, dt, gt).

Via simplecv.mmdet_v1.test_net.test_coco().

target_code (function): Python funciton object, default is None. predict_code (function): Python funciton object, default is None.

Returns:

Similar to results, list of (file_name, target, predict, dt, gt).
